\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* Abner \w another|strong="H5750"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w because|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*.
